overview: Over the course of one extraordinary day, the lives of a devious woman, a ruthless screenwriter, a hunky junkie and a snuff-film producer collide in an explosion of sex, violence, intrigue and death in this stylized urban action thriller. Twists and turns accumulate with alarming speed in the fast-paced film, which stars Juan Pablo Olyslager, Mafe Guarin Mcallister, Emanuel Loarca and Robert Rex.
title: Snuff Dogs
